metadata.title: Americans are heating their homes with bitcoin this winter
metadata.description: Winter across the U.S. means big bills for home heating oil, gas and electric furnaces, but in some cases, crypto like bitcoin is paying to keep Americans warm.
metadata.author: Kevin Williams
metadata.keywords: Gas utilities,Electric utilities,Electric power generation,Heating oil markets,U.S. Economy,Economy,Breaking News: Economy,Bitcoin,Cryptocurrency,Technology,Suppress Zephr,business news
